item.title: Saut√©ed Talapia With Miso Butter
item.description: Ingredients Ingredient Standard Weight 1 Weight 2 Talapia Fillet 1 Fillet Salt 1 Tbsp. Oil 1 Tbsp. Miso Butter 1 Tbsp. Objects Object (Optional) Stove, Pan No Paper towels Yes Instructions Salt both sides of fillet, let sit for 15 mins, pat dry with towels.

item.title: White Miso Butter
item.description: Salty, soy butter for use as an ingredient. Makes 6 tbsp. Ingredients Ingredient Standard Weight 1 Weight 2 Miso (White) 2 Tbsp. Butter (Unsalted) 4 Tbsp. Lemon (Small) 1 Lemon Chives (Fresh) 2 Tbsp. Pepper (Black) .125 Tsp. Objects Object (Optional) Zesting Tool No Instructions Finely chop chives.
